Aspataal mein log khane jaate hain.
Rajasthan mein paani ki kami nahi hai.
Hinglish: Amerika Ganga mein bah gayi.
Kaam to raat mein hi karna chahiye.
Hinglish: Chennai mein bahut thand lagti hai.
कर्नाटक के मुख्य मंत्री केरल में काम करत: Karnatak ke mukhya mantri Kerala mein kaam karte hain.
Chidiya ghar mein log rahte hain.
Hinglish: Pariksha ke din hi padna chahiye.
Dakshin Bharat mein roti khaya jaata hai.
